Content.Text:
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Easy there, <MYNAME>!
Are you all right?
I'll take you to the clinic at once!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What were you thinking, you fool?
If you overdo it like this, you know
that you'll end up fainting!
<PAGE>
What, you were having too much fun...?
That's a very immature attitude!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad you're all right!
I was worried there for a moment!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
For now, just get some rest.
Understand?
